text: José Diéguez Reboredo (25 April 1934 – 18 July 2022) was a Spanish Roman Catholic priest. He was the bishop of Osma-Soria from 1984 to 1987. He also was the Bishop of Orense from 1987 to 1996. He also was the Bishop of Tui-Vigo from 1996 to 2010. Diéguez Reboredo was born in Touro, Spain. Diéguez Reboredo died on 18 July 2022 at a hospital in Santiago de Compostela, Spain from problems caused by a stroke at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Spanish Roman Catholic bishops
title: José Diéguez Reboredo
